ack.p: Thanks to Bill Gray (state deer biologist) of the Alabama Division of Wildlife and Freshwater Fisheries for providing data on deer parturition, and Jim Lowe, Cornell Lab of Ornithology for nesting data of yellow-crowned night herons. We also wish to express our thanks to Jorge Hersel and the National Forest Service for permission to work on National Forest lands. Numerous field assistants contributed to the work.
